Wenshuo Guo

I am a first year PhD student in computer science at University of California, Berkeley, advised by Michael. I. Jordan. I am affiliated with the Berkeley AI Research group and RISE Lab.

I completed my Bachelor of Science in physics, computer science and applied mathematics from Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, where I was fortunate to work with Kwok Yip Szeto, Dit-Yan Yeung and Mordecai J. Golin .

I am broadly interested in theorectical machine learning and statistics.
